title: A Bigger Bag
description: Your hand limit is 8, not 6.

title: Abundance
description: Draw 3 Colossus cards. Every other Colossus draws 1 Colossus card.

title: Audacity
description: Each Colossus collects 2 Gold for every space they control adjacent to the Beast.

title: Authority
description: Each Colossus collects 2 Gold for every opposing Acolyte on their space.

title: Beast Mantle
description: During your turn you may discard as many Colossus cards as you want and draw 1 Beast Master card for every 2 Colossus cards you discarded.

title: Blinding Speed
description: On your turn, you may move 5 times instead of 4.

title: Companionship
description: Choose a Colossus. Beginning with you and continuing clockwise, each player may place 3 Acolytes from their hand onto the space of the Colossus you chose.

title: Comradery
description: Each Colossus collects 5 Gold if they are on a space with another Colossus.

title: Convene
description: Pull all Acolytes adjacent to your Colossus onto your Colossus's space.

title: Convert
description: Kill 1 Acolyte anywhere on the island and replace it with an Acolyte from your hand (if you have one).

title: Diplomacy
description: Each Colossus collects 1 Gold for every Acolyte they have on a space claimed an opposing Banner.

title: Dodge
description: (Play immediately after another player plays a card) If any of your Acolytes will die as a result of the card that was just played, you may move each of them to any adjacent space you choose.

title: Dominion
description: Beginning with you and continuing clockwise, each player may place a Banner on a space with no Colossi, Acolytes, or Banners on it. If there are no spaces available for you, do nothing.

title: Extortion
description: Each opposing Colossus must either give you a card of their choosing, or 2 Gold.

title: Fortitude
description: Each Colossus collects 2 Gold for each space that they control adjacent to their space.

title: Hegemony
description: Any players with Acolytes on your Colossus's space put all of their Colossus cards into a pile, shuffle them, and re-deal them amongst themselves beginning with you and continuing clockwise.

title: Influence
description: Beginning with you and continuing clockwise, each player may move an opposing Colossus once. Colossi can move within their own roads as usual.

title: Intimidate
description: Push all Acolytes adjacent to your Colossus 1 space away.

title: Outpost
description: You may add a second Banner to any of your Banners on the board, and score that space twice on your turn. As soon as this Perk is discarded, remove the second banner.

title: Pilfer
description: Draw 2 Colossus cards.

title: Purge
description: Move each Acolyte on your Colossus's space to any adjacent space (you can move Acolytes to different spaces).

title: Replace
description: Swap any 2 Colossi on the island.

title: Solidarity
description: The Colossus with the most Acolytes in their hand may place all the Acolytes in their hand on a single space (if two players are tied for the most Acolytes in their hand, do nothing).

title: Solitude
description: If any Colossi have no Acolytes (including their own Acolytes) on or adjacent to their space, they collect 7 Gold.

title: Steal
description: Take an opposing Colossus's Perk and leave it face-up in front of you. If you already had a Perk in front of you, discard it.

title: Teleport
description: Move any Colossus to any space (cannot move to the Volcano or to the Beast's space).

title: Tunnel Keys
description: When you move, all landmark tiles are adjacent to each other, and you may move freely between them.

title: Vandalize
description: Discard another Colossus's Perk.

title: Zeal
description: Beginning with you and continuing clockwise, each player may place all of the Acolytes from their hand onto spaces adjacent to the Volcano.
